responses: Hello there, how can I help you?
Good to see you, how can I help you?

patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: I am Stefano. I can guide you through my experiences, education path and projects!
This is Stefano talking. Welcome! Ask me about myself, my experiences, education path and projects

I am Stefano. I am currently a first year student for the EIT Digital Master School double degree with a major in Data Science and a minor in Innovation & Entrepreneurship. I am currently enrolled at KTH Royal Instute of Tecnology as entry university and will attend University of Twente as exit university where I will specialize in Data Science for persona information. I am expected to graduate in summer 2022. As a Data Scientist, my goal is to turn data into actionable insights applicable for customers' benefits and improved experience. I believe data can be used to have a real impact on people's daily lives. When I am not wondering on a new way to apply some data, I love practicing sports to keep myself healthy, enjoying time with my peers and meeting new people from all around the worlds.
